Title: Silverlight US Map 2.0 (US Map)
Description:
Silverlight US Map 2.0 

I needed to use a US Map for a Silverlight prototype applicaiton that I was working on.  The original project was here.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

This project is a Silverlight 4 User Control for data visualization of simple State-Value data using Visual Studio 2010.

The original project used Visual Studio 2008 and Silverlight 3.

Please use this project if you want to see how to highlight states and when mousing over them. When you mouse over the state a pop-up will appear with the states ordinal value and some additional details. It is my hope that there will be 3 or 4 examples using the same data to slice up the states by additional groupings.


Please checkout a link to the next version of the application in which I broke up the map into individual states. http://slebusstates.codeplex.com
Additional information on starting a new project is available here: Project Startup Guide.
